pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau congratulates Prime Minister of Australia Scott Morrison | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau today spoke with the Prime Minister of Australia Scott Morrison and congratulated him on assuming his duties as Australia’s 30th Prime Minister.

The two leaders noted the two countries’ strong bilateral ties, which are rooted in close friendship and a long tradition of standing together as allies.

The prime ministers reaffirmed the importance of continued cooperation on trade and security, and spoke of opportunities to enhance bilateral trade and investment.
